full_text: South Bend is where the best #Cubs baseball is happening in 2022. https://t.co/qaNAi3iGSi

Absolutely magnificent display of a great hitter managing to barrel a ball that's inside. Having that ability to recognize, pull your hands in, and make solid contact in a fraction of a second. Unreal. https://t.co/55QAvx3TZo
Pretty revolutionary thinking, giving your best player an extension. https://t.co/bMyF1fViiG
